skins.name: Shorekeeper
skins.description: She manifested in human-like form in response to the one who awakened her, marking the beginning you bestowed upon her. It was the starting point of a new life. It was not the first time, nor would it be the last.

tags.name: Traction
tags.description: Pulls targets within range towards a specific position

tags.name: DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

145.name: Unspoken Conjecture
145.description:
The <color=Highlight>Stellarealms</color> generated by Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>End Loop</color> gain the following enhancements:
- The effective range of the healing and buffs is extended by {0}
- The duration is extended by {1}s.
- Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Discernment</color> no longer ends the existing <color=Highlight>Stellarealm</color>.

146.name: Night's Gift and Refusal
146.description: The <color=Highlight><te href=850024>Outer Stellarealm</te></color> now increases the ATK of all nearby party members by {0}.

147.name: Infinity Awaits Me
147.description: Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>End Loop</color> grants Shorekeeper {0} Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered once every {1}s.

148.name: Overflowing Quietude
148.description: Gain {0} additional Healing Bonus when casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Chaos Theory</color>.

149.name: Echoes in Silence
149.description: Extend the ranges of the pulling effect of <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color> by {0} and <color=Highlight>Illation</color> by {1}.

150.name: To the New World
150.description: Increase the DMG Multiplier of Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Discernment</color> by {0}. Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Discernment</color> increases Shorekeeper's Crit. DMG by {1}.

params.name: Origin Calculus
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Each hit generates 1 <color=Highlight><te href=850022>Collapsed Core</te></color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Hold the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> to enter <color=Highlight>Unbound Form</color>, which consumes STA continuously. While in this form, Shorekeeper will:
- Generate a segment of <color=Highlight>Deductive Data</color> every second;
- Automatically collect nearby plant collectibles.
Using up all STA or actions such as casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> will end the <color=Highlight>Unbound Form</color> and deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> to the target. Each accumulated segment of <color=Highlight>Deductive Data</color> will convert into a segment of Empirical Data and generate a <color=Highlight><te href=850022>Collapsed Core</te></color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform a Plunging Attack. Each hit generates 1 <color=Highlight>Collapsed Core</color>. Quickly Press the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> after the Plunging Attack to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Press the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> after a successful Dodge to attack a target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.

params.name: Chaos Theory
params.description:
Restore HP for all nearby party members and summon 5 <color=Highlight>Dim Star Butterflies</color>, which automatically track and attack a target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Follow up with <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> in time to start the Basic Attack cycle from <color=Highlight>Stage 2</color>.
Can be performed in mid-air.

params.name: End Loop
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Outer Stellarealm</color></size>
Generate the <color=Highlight>Outer Stellarealm</color> to restore HP for all party members within its effective range continuously. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Inner Stellarealm</color></size>
When a party member uses <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color> within the <color=Highlight>Outer Stellarealm</color>, it evolves into the <color=Highlight>Inner Stellarealm</color>. Within the effective range of the <color=Highlight>Inner Stellarealm</color>, for every {0} of Shorekeeper's Energy Regen, all party members gain a {1} increase of Crit. Rate, up to {2}. 
<color=Highlight>Inner Stellarealm</color> has all the effects of the <color=Highlight>Outer Stellarealm</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Supernal Stellarealm</color></size>
When a party member uses <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color> within the <color=Highlight>Inner Stellarealm</color>, it evolves into the <color=Highlight>Supernal Stellarealm</color>. Within the effective range of the <color=Highlight>Supernal Stellarealm</color>, for every {3} of Shorekeeper's Energy Regen, all party members gain a {4} increase of Crit. DMG, up to {5}. 
<color=Highlight>Supernal Stellarealm</color> has all the effects of the <color=Highlight>Inner Stellarealm</color>.

params.name: Life Entwined
params.description: When a Resonator other than Shorekeeper takes a fatal blow, they will not be knocked out and will instead be healed for {0} of Shorekeeper's HP while Shorekeeper loses the same amount of HP. Shorekeeper's HP will not go below 1 from this effect. This effect can be triggered once every 10 minutes.

params.name: Self Gravitation
params.description: When the on-field Resonator is within range of a <color=Highlight><te href=850023>Stellarealm</te></color>, Shorekeeper's Energy Regen is increased by {0}, and Rover's Energy Regen is also increased by {1} if Rover is on the team.

params.name: Proof of Existence
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Enlightenment</color></size>
Shorekeeper appears to restore HP for all nearby party members and summon 5 <color=Highlight>Dim Star Butterflies</color>, which automatically track and attack a target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. This is considered Resonance Skill DMG.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Discernment</color></size>
When a <color=Highlight>Supernal Stellarealm</color> is generated, Shorekeeper's first Intro Skill triggered in its duration will be replaced with Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Discernment</color>.  Casting Discernment ends the current Stellarealm, restores HP for all nearby party members, and deals <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> to the targets. This attack is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit dealing Resonance Liberation DMG. The Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Discernment</color> can only be triggered once each time a <color=Highlight>Supernal Stellarealm</color> is generated.

params.name: Astral Chord
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Flare Star Butterfly</color></size>
Hitting a target with a Normal Attack generates a <color=Highlight>Collapsed Core</color>, which transforms into a <color=Highlight>Flare Star Butterfly</color> after {0}s. <color=Highlight>Flare Star Butterflies</color> automatically track and attack a target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. If there are already {1} <color=Highlight>Collapsed Cores</color>, Shorekeeper's next <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> hit will instantly convert a <color=Highlight>Collapsed Core</color> into a <color=Highlight>Flare Star Butterfly</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Illation</color></size>
When Shorekeeper has 5 segments of Empirical Data, casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> will consume all segments to pull in nearby targets, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Meanwhile, all generated <color=Highlight>Collapsed Cores</color> will instantly transform into <color=Highlight>Flare Star Butterflies</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Transmutation</color></size>
When Shorekeeper has 5 segments of Empirical Data, casting <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> will consume all segments to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Meanwhile, all generated <color=Highlight>Collapsed Cores</color> will instantly transform into <color=Highlight>Flare Star Butterflies</color>. Quickly press the <color=Highlight>Normal Attack Button</color> afterward to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Empirical Data</color></size>
Shorekeeper can hold up to 5 segments of Empirical Data.
- Obtain 1 segment of Empirical Data when <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 1, 2, or 4</color> hits a target.
- Obtain 2 segments of Empirical Data when <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color> hits a target.
- Obtain 1 segment of Empirical Data when <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> hits a target.
- Obtain 1 segment of Empirical Data when <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> hits a target.

params.name: Binary Butterfly
params.description:
Shorekeeper summons 1 <color=Highlight>Flare Star Butterfly</color> and 1 <color=Highlight>Dim Star Butterfly</color> to circle the Resonator on the field for up to {0}s, granting the following effects:  
- If the Resonator on the field is hit or launched, tapping the <color=Highlight>Dodge Button</color> allows the Resonator to immediately recover from the interruption, triggering a successful Dodge. The Resonator launched in the air can land on the ground standing if they are close to the ground. This effect can be triggered up to {1} time(s).
- All nearby party members' DMG is Amplified by {2}.

params.name: Tune Break: Rectifier
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
